aboutUs.announcement: A global leader in power and renewable energy distribution across the globe.

section2.title:
POWERING PROGRESS.
GLOBALLY. SUSTAINABLY.
section2.content: Nazeer Basha Syed Mech. & Eng. Equip. Trdg. Co. L.L.C., headquartered in Dubai, isa leading domestic and international force in the field of renewable and cleanenergy solutions. Established in 2013, the company has steadily grown with a firmfoundation in mechanical and engineering technologies, focusing on thedevelopment and distribution of high-performance, future-ready energy systems.From its early beginnings, the company has specialized in critical and backup powersolutions, earning the trust of clients across various regions. Its core offeringsinclude diesel and solar generators, advanced water pump systems, and agriculturalmachinery, designed to meet the unique requirements of irrigation, domestic, andindustrial operations. By combining technical innovation with practical engineering,the company delivers systems that are efficient, durable, and aligned with modernsustainability standards.

section3.title:
EMPOWERING ACCESS. 
ENABLING GROWTH.
section3.content: As part of a global energy movement, the company is committed to innovation,reliability, and environmental responsibility. With growing demand in the developing world, Nazeer Basha Syed Mech. & Eng. Equip. Trdg. Co. L.L.C., aims to bridge the energy access gap by empowering underserved communities and businesses with cutting-edge, accessible technologies.

section4.subTitle: Driving the Renewable Revolution
section4.title: Discover reliable and cost-effective solar power systems with NBS Solar.

section5.title: Our Mission: Powering a Sustainable Future through Global B2B Innovation
section5.content: Its mission goes beyond product delivery it's about making a measurable difference. Whether through improved agricultural output, enhanced power security, or water management, every solution is designed to support long-term economic growth and energy resilience.With a customer-first approach, a strong presence in the Middle East, Asia, and Africa, and an expanding dealer and service network, Nazeer Basha Syed Mech. & Eng. Equip. Trdg. Co. L.L.C. continues to redefine how essential energy and mechanical resources are delivered in the 21st century

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: At NBS Group, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your data.
section1List: Name, email address, phone number, and shipping/billing address
Device and browser information (for website usage analytics)
section2List: Communicate order updates and customer support
Improve our website, products, and services
Send promotional updates (only if you opt in)
privacyPolicy.section3Content: We take appropriate security measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, misuse, or disclosure. Your information is never sold or shared with third parties without your consent, except as required by law.
privacyPolicy.section4Content: Our website may use cookies to enhance user experience. You can choose to disable cookies through your browser settings.
privacyPolicy.section5Content: You may request access, correction, or deletion of your personal data at any time by contacting us.
privacyPolicy.section6Content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or how we handle your data, please contact us:

section6List.address: Nazeer Basha Syed Mech. & Eng. Equp. Trdg. LLC, PO Box: 379670, Deira, Dubai, U.A.E.

shippingPolicy.title: Shipping Policy
shippingPolicy.intro: At NBS Group, we value customer satisfaction and aim to provide clear and fair service policies. Please read below for our cancellation, return, and refund guidelines.
section1List: You may cancel your order within 24 hours if it has not yet been shipped.
For cancellations, contact us at sales@nbsgroups.com with your order number.
Custom or bulk orders cannot be canceled once confirmed.
section2List: Returns are accepted within 7 days of delivery for unused, uninstalled items in original packaging.
Products must include all accessories and be free from damage or installation marks.
section3List: Email sales@nbsgroups.com with your order number, reason for return, and product photos (if damaged or incorrect).
Return shipping is at the customer‚Äôs expense unless the product is faulty or incorrect.
Once approved, we will provide return instructions or a shipping label.
section4List: Refunds are issued within 7‚Äì10 business days after the returned item is received and inspected.
Refunds will be credited to your original payment method.
Partial refunds may apply for late returns, missing parts, or signs of use.
section5List: If your order is damaged or incorrect, contact us within 3 days of delivery with photos.
We will arrange a replacement or full refund at no additional cost.
shippingPolicy.section6Content: For all return, refund, or cancellation requests:

section6List.address: Nazeer Basha Syed Mech. & Eng. Equp. Trdg. LLC, PO Box: 379670, Deira, Dubai, U.A.E.

refundAndCancellationPolicy.title: Refund & Cancellation Policy
refundAndCancellationPolicy.intro: At NBS Group, we are committed to customer satisfaction and transparent service.
refundAndCancellationPolicy.section1Content: Orders can be canceled within 24 hours if not yet shipped. For custom or bulk orders, cancellation is not allowed once confirmed.
refundAndCancellationPolicy.section2Content: Returns are accepted within 7 days of delivery for unused, uninstalled items in original packaging. Non-returnable items include customized products, opened electrical components, and items marked ‚ÄúFinal Sale.‚Äù Return shipping is the customer's responsibility unless the product is defective or incorrect.
refundAndCancellationPolicy.section3List: Contact us within 3 days of delivery for a free replacement or full refund if the item is damaged, faulty, or incorrect.
refundAndCancellationPolicy.section4Content: Approved refunds will be processed within 7‚Äì10 business days to the original payment method.
refundAndCancellationPolicy.section5Content: Subject to availability. Return and re-shipping costs may apply.
refundAndCancellationPolicy.section6Content: For all return, refund, or cancellation requests:

section6List.address: Nazeer Basha Syed Mech. & Eng. Equp. Trdg. LLC, PO Box: 379670, Deira, Dubai, U.A.E.

deliveryPolicy.title: Delivery Policy
deliveryPolicy.intro: At NBS Group, we are committed to ensuring your orders are delivered promptly, securely, and with full transparency. This Delivery Policy outlines how we process, ship, and deliver orders to our customers in the United Arab Emirates and internationally.

section1.title: 1. Delivery Coverage
section1.domestic: All Emirates within the UAE (Abu Dhabi, Dubai, Sharjah, Ajman, Umm Al Quwain, Ras Al Khaimah, Fujairah).
section1.international: Selected countries worldwide (please contact our support team for availability before placing an order).

section2.title: 2. Processing Time
section2.point1: Orders are processed within 1‚Äì2 business days after payment confirmation.
section2.point2: Orders placed on weekends or UAE public holidays will be processed on the next working day.

section3.title: 3. Delivery Methods & Timelines
section3.intro: We use trusted courier partners to ensure safe and timely delivery. Estimated delivery times are:
section3.note: *Please note: Delivery timelines may vary depending on location, customs clearance, and unforeseen circumstances.*

section4.title: 4. Order Tracking
section4.description: Once your order has been shipped, you will receive:
section4.point2: A link to track your shipment in real-time.

section5.title: 5. Delivery Delays
section5.description: While we strive to deliver within the estimated timeframes, delays may occur due to:
section5.point1: Incorrect or incomplete delivery details provided by the customer.
section5.point2: Weather conditions, customs checks, or unforeseen logistical issues.
section5.note: In such cases, NBS Group will work closely with our delivery partners to resolve the issue promptly.

section6.title: 6. Delivery Address
section6.point1: Please ensure your shipping address is accurate and complete before placing an order.
section6.point2: Any changes after dispatch are subject to courier approval and may incur additional charges.

section7.title: 7. Missed Deliveries
section7.point1: If a delivery attempt is missed, the courier will attempt redelivery or contact you to reschedule.
section7.point2: Orders unclaimed within 5 days may be returned to us, and additional shipping charges may apply for resending.

section8.title: 8. Damaged or Missing Items
section8.description: If your order arrives damaged or incomplete:
section8.point1: Report the issue to sales@nbsgroups.com within 48 hours of delivery.
section8.point2: Provide photos of the damaged package/items for quicker resolution.
section8.point3: We will arrange for replacement, exchange, or refund as per our Return & Refund Policy.

section9.title: 9. Contact Us
section9.address: üè¢  Nazeer Basha Syed Mech. & Eng. Equp. Trdg. LLC, PO Box: 379670, Deira, Dubai, U.A.E.

deliveryPolicy.footer: values your trust and is committed to delivering your orders with care and reliability.

faqs.title: FAQ
faqs.question1: How do I place an order on the app?
faqs.question1Answer: To place an order, simply browse through our product catalog, select the items you want, add them to your cart, and proceed to checkout to confirm your order.
faqs.question2: Can I view product details, such as specifications and availability?
faqs.question2Answer: Yes, you can view detailed product information including specifications, availability, and customer reviews. Simply navigate to the product page within the app.
faqs.question3: What should I do if I need to cancel or modify an order?
faqs.question3Answer: To cancel or modify an order, go to the "My Orders" section, find your order, and follow the provided options to make changes.
faqs.question4: How can I find products from specific categories or brands?
faqs.question4Answer: You can use the app‚Äôs search filters to find products from specific categories or brands. Filter results by categories such as electronics or clothing.
faqs.question5: Is there a way to make payments for orders within the app?
faqs.question5Answer: Yes, you can securely make payments for orders using various payment methods available in the app, including credit/debit cards and digital wallets.
faqs.question6: Are my personal details and order information kept secure?
faqs.question6Answer: Yes, we prioritize the security and confidentiality of your personal details and order information. Our app complies with strict privacy and data protection standards.
faqs.question7: Can I request assistance with special product requirements or preferences?
faqs.question7Answer: Yes, you can request assistance with special product requirements or preferences during the ordering process. Simply specify your preferences, and we'll do our best to accommodate them.
faqs.question8: Is customer support available through this app?
faqs.question8Answer: While we facilitate online shopping, our app is not for customer support. For assistance, please contact our support team through the designated channels provided in the app.
